articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Wonsan Saltern
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Wonsan Saltern
						
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Wonsan Saltern.
					 After being briefed on the saltern before the map on its panoramic view, he acquainted himself in detail with the production there, going round the saltern covering vast area.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the saltern have made remarkable achievements just in a few years, including the systematic increase of output and the laying of solid material and technological foundation for radical growth in salt production in the near future, he highly praised their feats and gave special thanks to them.
					
					 Many salterns including the Wonsan Saltern and the Kwangmyongsong Saltern were built and their potentials have been fully displayed to usher in a new history of the powerful salt-making industry on the east coast which had been regarded as unfit for the salt production, he said, adding: This great change is a striking demonstration of the inexhaustible creative power of the Korean people in the era of Songun.
					
					 He repeatedly noted with high appreciation that in recent years Kangwon Province has done a lot of things in such nature-harnessing projects as the construction of the Wonsan Youth Power Station and the saltern and in the overall economic work.
					
					 He called upon all the sectors and units to work great miracles and make leaping forward in the general advance to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation by more properly organizing the mass political work and economic work.
					
					 He advanced highly important tasks that would serve as guidelines in developing the saltern on a long-term basis.
					
					 It is important among other things to increase the per hectare salt output by putting salt production on a modern basis as it is difficult to create many salt fields in the DPRK where cultivated land is limited, he said, calling for actively applying advanced salt production methods.
					
					 He underscored the need to take good care of the living of the workers of the saltern as they work in salty water for hours and indicated specific ways to do so.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Chol Bong, chief secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and Pak Nam Gi and Kim Kyong Hui, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Red Cross Talks Held
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Red Cross Talks Held 
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The north-south Red Cross talks took place at Mt. Kumgang resort from August 26 to 28.
					 Present at the talks from the north side were members of the delegation headed by Choe Song Ik, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society, and from the south side members of the delegation with Kim Yong Chol, secretary general of the south Korean Red Cross, as chief delegate. 
					
					 At the talks, both sides decided to arrange the reunion of separated families and their relatives in the north and the south between September 26 and October 1, the event which had been agreed to hold on the coming Harvest Moon Day, and reached an agreement on the technical matters concerning it. 
					
					 The north and the south also agreed to pursue consultations about Red Cross humanitarian issues including the issue of separated families and their relatives in the north and the south from the standpoint of developing the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Greetings to Cuban FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Cuban FM
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to his Cuban counterpart Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla Friday on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow strong.

articles.title: Reception Given on "ASEAN Day"
articles.content:
Reception Given on "ASEAN Day" 
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A reception was given in Pyongyang on Thursday to mark the "ASEAN Day".
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Present there were diplomatic envoys of Vietnam, Indonesia, Laos, Cambodia and Malaysia and embassy officials here.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Youth Day Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
Youth Day Celebrated in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Youth and students in various parts of the DPRK significantly celebrated Youth Day on August 28.
					 Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il and others and leading officials of the party and power bodies and working people's organizations in Pyongyang and in local areas visited industrial establishments, farms and universities including Kim Il Sung University, the Chollima Steel Complex and the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City and congratulated youth and students on the day. 
					
					 The senior party and state officials together with youth and students laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung, portraits of the smiling President and the monuments to the revolutionary activities of the peerlessly great persons at the relevant units and made bows to them in humble reverence.
					
					 Being briefed on the undying exploits of the peerlessly great persons and successes gained by the youth and students, they looked round the rooms for the education in the revolutionary history and rooms devoted to the history of the units, etc. 
					
					 The senior party and state officials went round production sites alive with the drive for increased production and campuses. They also met with exemplary officials and members of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and innovators and congratulated them on their successes and encouraged them to perform laudable feats in the efforts to achieve the prosperity of the country in the future, too.
					
					 Youth and students in various parts of the country enjoyed the holiday with performances given by art groups and sports and amusement games, etc.
					
					 The senior party and state officials and leading officials of party and power organs and working people's organizations in Pyongyang and local areas joined young people in sports games and also refereed the matches encouraging them to continue taking the lead in glorifying the Songun era in the days ahead, too.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held on Youth Day
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held on Youth Day 
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the country on Youth Day which falls on today. 
					 The participants of dancing parties held in the plazas of the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the April 25 House of Culture and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other places of Pyongyang danced to the tune of songs such as "Our General Is the Best", "Youth Is Glorified under the Care of the Workers' Party", "A Waltz on Youth Day" and "Steed Girl." 
					
					The dances became more pleasant when bands played songs such as "Let's March to the Tune of Army Song", "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party" and "Let Us Be Satellites of the Sun." The dancers looked back with deep emotion on the undying exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and renewed their determination to creditably play the role of the young vanguard in defending the country and building an economic power.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in different provincial capitals on the same day.

articles.title: Fast-food Restaurant in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Fast-food Restaurant in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Samthaesong Soft Drink Restaurant located in Moranbong District, Pyongyang is crowded with Korean and foreign customers.
					 It serves more than 20 kinds of dishes including burgers, waffles, French fries and crispy fried chicken along with soft drinks.
					
					 It was opened at the beginning of June last. Most of the tables are arranged by the semicircle windowed wall so that the customers can take food, looking out the street through windows.
					
					 It instantly cooks and serves dishes to the customers as they demand.
					
					 Manager Ko Jong Ok told KCNA that the restaurant will make world-famous foods with local raw materials to the taste of the Korean people.

articles.title: Speed Campaign Youth Shock Brigade Performs Feats
articles.content:
Speed Campaign Youth Shock Brigade Performs Feats
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The members of the speed campaign youth shock brigade are giving full display to the honor of a dynamic shock brigade in the socialist economic construction.
					 Today they are significantly celebrating the Youth Day with great pride of devoting themselves to the project for the reconstruction of Mansudae Street and other major construction sites.
					
					 The brigade, organized in May of Juche 64 (1975), has achieved great successes over last years in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The members of the youth shock brigade built many monumental edifices such as the International Friendship Exhibition House, Grand People's Study House, Chongnyon (youth) Hotel, Changgwang Health Complex and Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and rendered distinguished services to the construction of the revolutionary sites in Mt. Wangjae, Samjiyon, Hoeryong and other parts of the country.
					
					 They also displayed to the full the heroic stamina of the Korean youths in the construction of major objects including the Kumgangsan Youth Railway Line electrification and Youth Hero Motorway.
					
					 The dwelling houses in Changgwang, Munsu, Kwangbok and Thongil streets and other parts of Pyongyang are also permeated with sincere efforts of the young builders.
					
					 The speed campaign youth shock brigade has produced lots of recipients of state commendation and order since its formation.

articles.title: Immortal Feats of Kim Il Sung for Youth Movement
articles.content:
Immortal Feats of Kim Il Sung for Youth Movement
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- August 28 is the founding anniversary of the Young Communist League of Korea by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Greeting the anniversary, the Korean people are looking back with deep emotion upon the immortal feats of the President who had wisely led the Korean youth movement with his outstanding idea and leadership, regarding the question of youth as an important question related with the success or failure of the revolution and the future destiny of the nation in his early years.
					
					 In the early years of his revolutionary activities, he, with deep-going analysis of the historical experience of the country and the world revolutionary movement and the obtaining revolutionary situation, put forward the Juche-oriented idea of giving importance to the youth, the first of its kind in history.
					
					 The President started his revolutionary activities with youth work and paved the way of the Korean revolution through youth movement.
					
					 He brought home the mission and duty assigned before the country and the revolution to the young people of the new generation unaffected by the old trend of thought, united them around the revolutionary organization and let them take part in the revolutionary struggle to accomplish the people's cause of independence.
					
					 Under his energetic guidance and revolutionary education, many revolutionaries of the new generation had grown to be the backbone of the anti-Japanese armed ranks and played a vanguard role in the sacred war to liberate the country.
					
					 The glorious anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle brought his idea of giving importance to youth to a brilliant realization and proved its validity and invincible vitality.
					
					 Thanks to this idea of the President, the young people of Korea unhesitatingly dedicated their youth and lives to the country in the fierce Fatherland Liberation War against U.S. imperialism and thus defended the independence and sovereignty of the country. After the war, they displayed the honor of being a shock brigade in building a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence.
					
					 Today, too, the Korean youth are further demonstrating their invincible might as the vanguard unit in the general advance of the Songun revolution under the sagacious and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il who carries forward the President's idea of giving importance to the youth.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Editorially Observes Youth Day
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Editorially Observes Youth Day
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial dedicated to Youth Day calls on the youth to fully display the spirit of the young vanguard of Songun in the on-going general advance to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation, highly proud of carrying forward the most brilliant history and tradition of the youth movement under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					 The daily refers to the undying feats President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by wisely leading the Korean youth movement with their outstanding ideas and extraordinary leadership.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean youth have performed heroic feats for the country and the revolution by fully displaying their wisdom and courage, true to the ideas and guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea and the President and Kim Jong Il. This is the glorious tradition of the struggle of the Korean youth.
					
					 The young people were the staunch fighters who, true to the leadership of the President, shed blood and sweat without hesitation in the arduous struggle to liberate Korea and in the days of building a new country and during the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War and vanguard fighters who performed heroic epic feats to shine long in the history of the country by taking the lead in the drive for effecting a great revolutionary surge in the days of building a socialist power on debris in the postwar period.
					
					 The youth of the DPRK firmly defended Korean-style socialism with arms and built lots of monumental structures including the Youth Hero Motorway and modern power stations in different parts of the country  by remaining true to the Party's Songun leadership in a do-or-die spirit even in the days of "the Arduous March", forced march. In this course they played the role of vanguard in paving the way for building a land of bliss.
					
					 The successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and success made in the second nuclear test, both events that fully demonstrated the dignity and might of Songun Korea, are also associated with the heroic endeavors and ardent patriotism of young scientists in the DPRK.
					
					 Very profound and great are the Party's trust and expectation towards the young vanguard in the on-going drive for opening the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the paper notes, calling upon the youth to highly exalt the honor of being vanguard and shock-brigade on all fronts of socialist construction.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates a signed article to the 6th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work on thoroughly implementing the line of economic construction in the era of Songun set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on August 28, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the line of giving priority to the development to the defence industry while simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture is a strategic line of socialist economic construction to be consistently held fast to in the era of Songun and a line of economic construction which provides a firm material and economic guarantee for ensuring the WPK's Songun revolutionary leadership and implementing its Songun politics.
					
					 The past six years since the publication of the work are the stirring years in which historic changes have taken place in all fields of the Korean revolution and construction, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Under the WPK's Songun leadership the People's Army has been developed into the invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and powerful nuclear deterrent for self-defence built to provide a sure guarantee for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and building a great prosperous and powerful nation under any complicated situation and hard conditions.
					
					 The priority sectors and basic industrial fields of the national economy including metal, power and coal industries and railway transport have been reenergized, many monumental structures such as the Wonsan Youth Power Station and the Paekma-Cholsan Waterway sprang up in different parts of the country and a firm guarantee was provided for bringing about a decisive turn in improving the standard of people's living through radical changes in light industry and agriculture.
					
					 The WPK's line of socialist economic construction in the era of Songun serves as great patriotic line of economic construction as it helps the DPRK throw its rays as a thriving nation in the 21st century to be envied by the world.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Work for Great National Unity
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Work for Great National Unity
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Only when one works for the great unity of the whole nation one can contribute to achieving national reunification and live a worthy life as a patriot.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 How to approach the issue of great national unity is a touchstone to distinguish patriotism from treachery as patriotism means ardent love for the country and great national unity is an indispensable requirement of the movement for national reunification, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 Now that the separatist forces at home and abroad work hard to foster discord and mistrust and confrontation among members of the nation and divide and destabilize the patriotic forces for reunification it presents itself as an urgent task to achieve the great unity of the nation.
					
					 To work hard for national reunification represents the most patriotic struggle and a struggle for national unity is inseparable from the one for accomplishing the cause of national reunification. Therefore, whoever endeavors for great national unity becomes a patriot whereas whoever stands in the way of great national unity and seeks division is bound to be cursed as a traitor.
					
					 There took place the historic Pyongyang meeting between the north and the south which culminated in the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration. This brought a new era of independent reunification to this land, bringing about landmark successes in the cause of the great national unity and putting the cause of reunification on a new higher level. These are the brilliant fruition of the outstanding idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il, supreme incarnation of patriotism.
					
					 All the Koreans should put the wishes and interests common to the nation above anything else and subordinate everything to that purpose in a bid to achieve and consolidate the great unity and attain national reunification, the greatest desire of the nation, as early as possible, urges the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Socialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Socialism
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Socialism is the idea and revolutionary banner of the popular mass struggling for independence, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a signed article.
					 It is intrinsic to the nature of a social being to live and develop independently as the master of the world and his own destiny, free from any restriction and subjugation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Out of such desire and demand, people have waged incessant struggle to build a society in which they are met.
					
					 It was not until the emergence of socialist society that popular masses could lead a genuine, independent and creative life free from all sorts of socio-political subjugation.
					
					 Only under socialism, is it possible for all the countries and nations to achieve independent development and prosperity, ridding themselves from any form of domination and subjugation and ensure durable peace and security of the world guaranteeing the existence and development of humankind.
					
					 There may be turns and twists in the process of the development of socialism. But this does not mean that there is a mistake in the idea of socialism itself.
					
					 The imperialists and their venal mouthpieces are absurdly distorting and abusing the socialist idea in a bid to break the world revolutionary people's faith in socialism and foster illusion about capitalism and thus turn back the progress of history.
					
					 Today many more people in the world are turning out in the struggle for socialism, aware that capitalism leads to death and ruin and only socialism can help all people to enjoy a free, equal and dignified, genuine life suited to the nature as an independent being and carve out their destinies independently.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that socialism is science and truth and its victory is sure to come no matter how persistently the imperialists and reactionaries speak ill of it.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Assailed
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Assailed 
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Jiri Jarka, honorary chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, issued a statement on August 25 expressing deep concern over the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities.
					 The statement said that the main objective of the joint military exercises was to mount a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is exposed to a potential threat posed by the ceaseless provocations of the U.S. and Korea still remains divided, it noted. 
					
					 Accusing the U.S. of illegally keeping south Korea under its occupation in violation of the Korean Armistice Agreement and the resolution of the 30th UN General Assembly, the statement denounced the dangerous military exercises of the U.S. threatening the peace on the Korean Peninsula and blocking its reunification.

articles.title: Improved Inter-Korean Relations Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Improved Inter-Korean Relations Called for in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on August 25 urging the authorities to opt for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					 The organization in a press release issued at the conference warmly hailed the joint press release issued between the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee and the Hyundai Group of south Korea.
					
					 Noting that the five-point proposal agreed upon between the two sides is in line with the aspiration and will of the south Koreans, the organization urged the authorities to immediately implement the agreement with the north.

articles.title: Songun Leadership Feats of Kim Jong Il Lauded
articles.content:
Songun Leadership Feats of Kim Jong Il Lauded
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- G. Debarajan, secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc, issued a statement on Aug. 22 to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il started the Songun leadership with his on-site guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, the statement said that his Songun leadership is of weighty significance in the history of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership, the KPA has grown to be an invincible army, it stressed.
					
					 The statement said that they wish the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people great successes in their efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, holding high the banner of socialism, the banner of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Report of Supreme Command of KPA Supported in Mexico
articles.content:
Report of Supreme Command of KPA Supported in Mexico
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Socialist Party of Mexico, the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Fellowship Institute to Honor the Memory of President Kim Il Sung, the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association issued a joint statement on August 22 in support of the report issued by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army. 
					 It fully supported the order issued to the entire army, all the people and the whole country by the Supreme Command of the KPA to cope with the large-scale joint military exercises for aggression kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities against the DPRK.
					
					 The order of the Supreme Command of the KPA was an entirely just measure for self-defence as it was an order to protect the supreme interests of the country and the nation from the reckless moves of the war maniacs for aggression, it stressed.
					
					 It appealed to all the political parties, governments and organizations in the world to strongly denounce the reckless war exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities and voice stronger support to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their 150-day campaign for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Observed in Mexico
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Observed in Mexico
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism published the 28th issue of its bulletin on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The bulletin carried a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and an article under the title of "The invincible bulwark of socialism".
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The steadfast guiding idea is the first factor that has made it possible for the DPRK to become an invincible socialist bulwark.
					
					 From the very day of its foundation the DPRK has pushed ahead with the socialist cause, guided by the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, founding-father.
					
					 The Songun idea serves as the main guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause in the DPRK as it calls for placing the military affairs above anything else and putting forward the army as the main force in accomplishing the cause of socialism.
					
					 The second factor is the tremendous national strength. 
					
					 In the DPRK the unity and cohesion of all the people in thought and purpose have been maintained steadfastly on the basis of the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The rock-firm mass foundation is the third factor that has made it possible for the DPRK to display its dignity as the indestructible socialist fortress.
					
					 The Korean people are now working new innovations and feats with each passing day to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of the President, father of socialist Korea, true to the plan and will of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 The DPRK will always demonstrate its dignity as the invincible socialist bulwark.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Salina de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Salina de Wonsan
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Salina de Wonsan.
					Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de produccion recorriendo la salina extendida en una vasta area.
					
					Los obreros de esta empresa sentaron el solido cimiento material y tecnico, que permitira aumentar sistematica y trascendentalmente la produccion de la sal en un futuro cercano.
					
					El Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho por ese y otros exitos sorprendentes logrados en unos anos por los obreros de la salina y les dio agradecimiento especial apreciando mucho sus meritos.
					
					Con la construccion de la Salina de Wonsan, la de Kwangmyongsong y otras que aportan sus beneficios en lo suficiente,  se inicio en la zona litoral del Mar Este, donde se consideraba imposible producir la sal, la nueva historia de la potente industria salina, apunto el Dirigente.
					
					Subrayo que este gran cambio es una muestra de la inagotable creatividad del pueblo coreano de la era del Songun (priorizacion militar). 
					
					Volvio a evaluar altamente a los habitantes de la provincia de Kangwon diciendo que ellos hicieron muchas cosas en los ultimos anos en las labores para la transformacion de la naturaleza y la gestion economica general como la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud de Wonsan y la salina.
					
					  Todos los sectores y unidades deben organizar con mas esmero la labor politica sobre las masas y los quehaceres economicos, de modo que se registren grandes proezas y auge en la ofensiva general para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera, subrayo.
					
					  Seguidamente, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de orientacion para desarrollar la salina con vistas al futuro.
					
					  En nuestro pais es dificil acondicionar muchas salinas porque son limitadas las tierras cultivables, dijo.
					
					  Por lo tanto, lo mas importante es modernizar los procesos de produccion de la sal para aumentar el rendimiento por hectarea, senalo y destaco la necesidad de aplicar activamente los avanzados metodos de produccion.
					
					  Hay que atender bien la vida de los obreros de la salina que trabajan muchas horas en el agua salada, encomendo y dio la indicacion detallada del particular.
					
					  El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Kangwon, Ri Chol Bong, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Kim Kyong Hui.

articles.title: Conversaciones de la Cruz Roja Norte-Sur
articles.content:
Conversaciones de la Cruz Roja Norte-Sur
  Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ATCC) - Tuvieron  lugar del dia 26 al 28 en el Monte Kumgang las conversaciones de la cruz roja Norte-Sur de Corea.
					  En la ocasion participaron por la parte Norte los miembros de la delegacion encabezada por Choe Song Ik, vicepresidente del CC de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y por la Sur los de la delegacion con Kim Yong Chol, secretario general de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea como delegado-jefe.
					
					  Ambas partes decidieron organizar desde el proximo dia 26 de septiembre hasta el primero de octubre el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur programado en ocasion del Chusok (fiesta otonal) que viene y acordaron los problemas de trabajo relacionados con ello.
					
					  Tambien, acordaron seguir consultando en el punto de vista del desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur el problema humanitario de la cruz roja incluyendo el de los familiares y parientes dispersados.

articles.title: En Corea conmemoran el Dia de la Juventud
articles.content:
En Corea conmemoran el Dia de la Juventud
  Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ATCC) -- Los jovenes y estudiantes de distintas partes de Corea conmemoraron significativamente este viernes su fiesta.
					  Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il y otros funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido y el Poder, organizaciones de masas del centro y localidades  visitaron a la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Complejo de Acero Chollima, la Granja Cooperativa de Migok, fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades para felicitar a los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					  Los cuadros del partido y el Estado, junto con los jovenes y estudiantes, rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras depositar los cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores al pie de la estatua de bronce y la imagen de este con amplia sonrisa y las lapidas a la actividad historico-revolucionaria de los grandes hombres sin par, erguidas en respectivas unidades.
					
					  Al recorrer la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial escucharon las explicaciones sobre las inmortales hazanas de los grandes hombres y los exitos logrados por los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					  Tambien, recorrieron los centros de produccion y las universidades, felicitaron los exitos de los ejemplares funcionarios y miembros de la union juvenil e innovadores laborales. y les encomendaron que realicen en el futuro tambien mas proezas preciosas en la lucha por la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					  Los jovenes y estudiantes de distintas partes  pasaron la fiesta con las funciones de los grupos artisticos y los partidos deportivos  y  recreativos.
					
					 Los cuadros del partido y el Estado y los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido y el Poder, organizaciones de masas del centro y localidades participaron junto con los jovenes en las competencias deportivas y arbitraron los partidos deportivos estimulando a ellos para que se pongan en la delantera de la lucha para glorificar la epoca del Songun.

articles.title: Restaurante Samthaesong
articles.content:
Restaurante Samthaesong
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ATCC) -- En estos dias, el restaurante Samthaesong situado en el capitalino municipio de Moranbong esta animado de clientes coreanos y extranjeros.
					Este les sirve los refrescos y mas de 20 comidas inclusive pan con jamon, pan asado, patata frita y pollo frito.
					
					El interior del restaurante inaugurado a principios de junio pasado esta acondicionado especificamente de forma redonda para que los clientes tomen las comidas mirando el panorama de la avenida.
					
					Se caracteriza de servicio a los clientes los platos pedidos cocinandolos dentro de tiempo corto.
					
					La jefa Ko Jong Ok, entrevistada con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea, senalo que el restaurante servira las comidas ampliamente conocidas en el mundo conforme al apetito de coreanos apoyandose en las materias primas criollas.
